summary: A Dagger Resource to be shared with Nexus community
descriptionHtml:
[center][i][b]Here is a dagger that I modeled, I'm putting it up as a resource for a few reasons.
Recently my old HHD crashed, which leaves me with a severe lack of textures to use, not that I was ever very good at texturing
But, my original intention for this dagger was for those of us the LOVE the Dark Brotherhood.
I wanted my assassin to have something dark, and very lethal / evil looking.

I can not take credit for the design, was something I remember seeing one time, and I modeled it from memory, with a few embellishments or mistakes from the original.
This piece is free to be used in anyway ONLY if you give me the credit due,
Again, do not give me credit for the design, just the modeling of the dagger.

I would honestly like to see peoples comments, textures, and reworks they can do with this piece.

The Lo-Poly model is 3,982 tris and was modeled in 3dsMax 2017
UV maps are done and laid out, again can be reworked if you are more experienced or can do better

Ok, now for the list of what's included
Lo-Poly model in .obj format
"Hi-Poly" model in .obj format
Solid UV template
UV template with wireframe shown

[/b][/i][b][i]The only program that was used was 3dsMax 2017, I did no attempt to sculpt, as I haven't gotten my drawing tablet reinstalled on the new HHD set up.

Enjoy, and show me what you can do with it![/i][/b][/center][center][/center][center][/center]
author: Scuffed_down
